text: Kamaria (Kamariya, Kumheria, kamariha,) is a subdivison of Ahirs(Abhira) or Yadav caste in India, prominently found in Uttar Pradesh. The Kamaria clan includes over 100 Gotras in it. They are well known for their political dominance over Uttar Pradesh as the founder of Samajwadi Party, Lt. Mulayam Singh Yadav belonged to the Kamaria subcaste of Ahirs. == References == Category:Ahir Category:Ahir clans Category:Castes
title: Kamaria Ahir
